name: sveltia-cms
description: Complete Sveltia CMS skill for lightweight, Git-backed content management. Sveltia is the modern successor to Decap/Netlify CMS with 5x smaller bundle (300 KB), faster GraphQL-based performance, and solves 260+ predecessor issues. Use this skill when setting up Git-based CMS for static sites (Hugo, Jekyll, 11ty, Gatsby, Astro, SvelteKit, Next.js), blogs, documentation sites, marketing sites, or migrating from Decap/Netlify CMS. Framework-agnostic with first-class i18n support and mobile-friendly
